duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and maintain machine shop equipment, including Southwestern Industries mills and lathes utilizing ProtoTRAK controls.
Review drawings, instructions, blueprints, or samples to ensure accurate production and take precise measurements for cutting or shaping.
Select appropriate machine and settings for a given task, monitor production, and adjust feed and other settings as necessary.
Check output for quality assurance, maintain a safe and clean workstation, and contribute to team effort by accomplishing related tasks as needed.
Support R&D and prototype small batch projects, as well as the sheet metal and misc. metals shop needs.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED equivalent required, with experience in machining w/ steel, aluminum, and stainless steel. ProtoTRAK control experience and Southwestern knee mills and lathes experience are a plus.
